block.p: Syria Said to Approve Pullout A United Nations envoy said Syria was ready to accept that Israel's retreat from southern Lebanon was a complete withdrawal. PAGE A6
Last Filing for Microsoft In its final filing before a ruling on antitrust violations, Microsoft sought to alter most elements of the government's breakup plan. PAGE C1

A Not-So-Sweet Sound A team of scientists has confirmed what many theatergoers have long suspected: there is no quiet way to unwrap candy. PAGE A16
